hero_subtitle: The foundational architecture for your digital transformation 4.0
hero_desc: The Unified Namespace (UNS) architecture has established itself as the foundational architecture for building your Digital Transformation. On July 31, 2023, Gartner officially recognized UNS as a reference architecture, enabling modern collaboration between Operation Technology (OT) and Information Technology (IT).
contact_subtitle: This site is public and Open Source.
footer_license: #UNSManifesto is Open Sourced with the free license
sign_intro: Join the movement for open, interoperable, and scalable industrial systems. Sign as an individual or on behalf of your company.
